short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Chrome New Tab with our extension! Say goodbye to the usual blank page and hello to a world of entertainment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension replaces your New Tab button with a dynamic page that recommends the latest and most popular movies and TV shows, keeping you up-to-date with the hottest content. Plus, it features a convenient bookmarks bar to keep your favourite tabs just a click away, and an integrated Bing search bar for all your browsing needs. Elevate your browsing experience with our must-have Chrome extension. 

By clicking 'Add to Chrome' from the Chrome Web Store I accept and agree to installing What Today? and setting New tab to Microsoft Bing that provided by the service, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy Important 

Information and links: 

Data Collection: Our service may collect Personal, Usage, and Search Data, which are anonymously stored to enhance your experience and improve our services. Read our comprehensive Privacy Policy for more information. 

About Us - https://whattodayextension.com/aboutus.html 
Contact Us - https://whattodayextension.com/contactus.html 
EULA - https://whattodayextension.com/eula.html 
Privacy Policy - https://whattodayextension.com/privacypolicy.html
